name: Death Cult (LD 48)
description:
Strategy game about a cultists diving deeper and deeper into deepest depth of seven hells to beat Soton, Lord of All Bad Things…

We haven’t much time to show different locations and better represent theme (Deeper and deeper), and there is bugs also. But it’s jam, right?

Btw, it’s the first jam (and even the very first game) for our programmer Brutor

Anyway, thank you for playing! Feel free to leave a comments, suggestions, bug reports, flowers, money or your soul.

!IMPORTANT! Alas, our composer catch a cold, so he couldn’t compose unique music, but we used his previous tracks. You can find his damn good chiptunes on your favorite music service. Just search for “Nuclear Mushroom Boom”
